config.twitchchatbridgeforge.title: Twitch Chat Bridge
config.twitchchatbridgeforge.cosmetics.p: Put this at the start of your messages to send them to a Twitch channel
config.twitchchatbridgeforge.cosmetics.d: Customize the timestamp format messages are going to follow
config.twitchchatbridgeforge.cosmetics.i: Messages from users in this list won't be displayed
config.twitchchatbridgeforge.cosmetics.t: Autocomplete /twitch watch channel names with names from users in your server
config.twitchchatbridgeforge.broadcast.t: Sends Twitch chat messages to the server chat
config.twitchchatbridgeforge.broadcast.p: This is going to be added to the beginning of messages broadcasted to the server
Welcome to the Minecraft-Twitch Bridge mod!
To enable it just do /twitch enable when you're done setting up the config.
text.twitchchatbridgeforge.command.enabl: Before doing that you have to set your config!
You won't connect to a channel because you haven't selected any. You can select a channel with /twitch watch [channel]
text.twitchchatbridgeforge.command.watch: The mod will connect to '%s' as soon as you enable it.
text.twitchchatbridgeforge.chat.integrat: Twitch integration is not enabled, to enable it do /twitch enable.
text.twitchchatbridgeforge.bot.kicked: Kicked from the current channel because: '%s'
